org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service

Class RecipeService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cookbookgeeks.webkochbuch.service.RecipeService

  • @Service(value="recipeService")
@Transactional
public class RecipeService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements all regularily used database functions such as adding, deleting, updating or reading of objects.
    Author:
    Nils Sommer

      • createIndex

        public void createIndex()
        Creates index files for the fulltext search. Call this method, if unindexed objects are in the database or you run webkochbuch for the first time.

        Returns:

      • search

        public java.util.List<Recipe> search(java.lang.String pattern,

        Executes a search on all recipes for the given pattern only on the given fields (attributes).
        Parameters:
        pattern - to search for
        attributes - of the recipes to search on

        a list of recipes
